channel.title: Board renamed
channel.description:
Well... I've noticed for a really long time that the private client hacking board doesn't really fit the name in all honesty.
Talk about your exploits with the 317 client here.
higher revision items have been posted in here, jarring tutorials, webclient tutorials, everything you can imagine. Those really aren't "exploits" it's turned into a "Client Tutorial" section in all honesty.

item.title: Board renamed
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I updated the description. Hopefully it’s better now. Feel free to post another suggestion if you have a better alternative. Thanks for the suggestion.

Resolved.

Read full topic

item.title: Board renamed
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

true, a rewriting of description would probably be best

Read full topic

item.title: Board renamed
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I dunno. Maybe the description just needs to be reworked. Mostly everything related to clients are a direct or indirect result of (ie, they come from or contribute to) client hacking by some means.

Read full topic

item.title: Board renamed
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Maybe not a client tutorial section but something more “generalized” like…

“Client Support” or “Client Misc” or something. You rarely see exploits of the client being shown.

Read full topic

item.title: Board renamed
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

So you think it should become a client tutorials section instead, then? What about all the general topics that aren’t tutorials, yet still discuss exploits? I think exploits is more general-fitting.

Read full topic
